plot: This project is a documentary about Drag Queens and Kings and their views and what dressing in drag means to them as well as other aspects about their lives.
title: Life's A Drag
plot_es: This project is a documentary about Drag Queens and Kings and their views and what dressing in drag means to them as well as other aspects about their lives.
plot_en: This project is a documentary about Drag Queens and Kings and their views and what dressing in drag means to them as well as other aspects about their lives.
